info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024
rating_comment:
The place
It is a really outstanding place. very comfortable and cozy and has all the amenities as listed.
one request to the owner is to update the location on Airbnb where the maps location navigates to a different one from that described. Fortunately I had been to Dhaka before and was able to reach with some effort but for someone new to the city it would be a hassle. (Commenting on Feb 2024)

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
We stayed for three nights. Very convenient location. Neat and clean apartment with all amenities. Highly recommended. Mr. Fatik is very helpful and responsive.
Good to keep in mind that, the apartment is very close to the main road, so you would hear honks during the night. There are mosquitoes, which is very common in Bangladesh. Aerosol spray was provided. However, you may want to bring a mosquito repellent as well.
I would definitely stay there again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Mabroor's place is an excellent house for foreigners as well as Bangladeshi. I am grateful for quick response and sincere work of Mabroor and manager Fatiq. All security guards (24/7) were well mannered. All AC units, Wifi, elevator were working fine. No complaints about hydro, water, cleaning etc. We didn't notice any power outage or generator failure. Transportation is very convenient from Mabroor's house/location. All grocery store, shopping mall, and airport is closed by. All of my family members felt comfortable in 17 days (July 5, 2023, to July 22, 2023) of our living here.

rating_comment: Highly recommended

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
I had a great stay with my full family there...
Every appliances were perfect except the 2nd master bed's ac... i had to use fan the second day... my house is clean and well maintained, I liked the manager's behaviour and communication was perfect, there's no problem with safety as the house is adjacent to the thana... thanks

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Good experience, though Mr. Mabroor was abroad but he communicated and maintained the property accordingly. Had a nice experience with my family. His caretaker and manager helped us a lot when needed. Place is clean with required kitchen facilities. Good location for transport and outside food, there's a super shop just beside the house that helped us a lot. But the main road aside property can be uncomfortable for some because of the sound as it's just beside one of the busiest highway. Need to be careful while using the kitchen as upper cabinet can be dangerous.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Excellent place to stay long or short time. it’s safe and secured place, fully furnished apartment and place was clean and tidy. professional host especially the owner of apartment Mr Mabroor is a professional & friendly person. i’m highly satisfied and next trip again i prefer to stay here.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: The place is really nice and cozy. Mr. Mabroor is a fantastic host and the apartment comes with standard amenities and supplies. We really enjoyed our stay although it was just for few hours before catching the flight. Definitely recommend the place for those who wants a location nearby airport.
